assessment_item.title: ‘ಅಪೊಲೋ’ ವೈದ್ಯಶಾಲೆಗಳ ಸಮೂಹವನ್ನು ಆರಂಭಿಸಿದವರು.
assessment_item.body:

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:3789"},{"text":"

ಅಜೀಂ ಪ್ರೇಮ್‍ಜಿ 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:3799"},{"text":"

ಏಕ್ತಾ ಕಪೂರ್
